snippet: With most American and NATO troops set to leave by 2014, advocates of aid warn against a sharp cutoff of financing from the United States and its allies.
abstract: Pres Obama's decision to withdraw most American troops from Afghanistan by 2014 has raised debate over how long United States and its allies should continue pouring civilian aid into country.
lead_paragraph: With most American and NATO troops set to leave by 2014, advocates of aid warn against a sharp cutoff of financing from the United States and its allies.
